Client module¶

Clients’s module.

Launch: python client.py localhost

  • arguments:

  • -p - Number port. Default 7777

client.py¶

Main client module

Class for check methods

Function for create presence message :param username: str :return: dict

Function for receiving and processing message from server :param client: str :return:

class client.client.Read(client)¶

Class for receiving message from server

run()¶

Method representing the thread’s activity.

You may override this method in a subclass. The standard run() method invokes the callable object passed to the object’s constructor as the target argument, if any, with sequential and keyword arguments taken from the args and kwargs arguments, respectively.

class client.client.Send(client, username)¶

Class input messages from user and for sending messages to server

run()¶

Method representing the thread’s activity.

You may override this method in a subclass. The standard run() method invokes the callable object passed to the object’s constructor as the target argument, if any, with sequential and keyword arguments taken from the args and kwargs arguments, respectively.
